LanguageData.Book_Ammo.label: Ammo book
LanguageData.Book_Ammo.description: This book is a manual for making ammunition for heavy weapons.Careful, there is a lot of text in Russian.
LanguageData.Book_ImmunoBlockers.label: Immunoblockers book
LanguageData.Book_ImmunoBlockers.description: This book contains information on the manufacture of immune blockers, pills designed specifically for use with cyber-implants.
